thing-type.label: DP-32 / IX-30 / IX-32 PIR Sensor
thing-type.description: PIR Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtThe hardware board for the IX30 (wall) and IX32 (ceiling) is the same thing and reports the same Type and ID.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtEnter the Inclusion Mode of gateway, and press the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s, then the PIR sensor will stay in enrollment state until successfully enrolled into network or enrollment time out after 30s.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtEnter the Exclusion Mode of gateway, and press the tamper switch 3 times within 1.5s, then the PIR sensor will be removed after a period of time.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtQuickly press tamper switch once, the PIR sensor will automatically send wake-up information, and there will be 10s after wake-up to receive gateway setting information.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Basic Set
parameter.description: Basic Set<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIf there is any device in Association Group 2 the PIR Sensor will send BASIC Set = Value command to control that deivce when the PIR is triggered.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Turn Off Light Time Configuration
parameter.description: Turn Off Light Time Configuration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtIf there is any device in Association Group 2 the PIR Sensor will send BASIC Set = Value command to Group 2 and send Basic Set = 0x00 to turn of light after 5 x t seconds- Set value t means to send the BAsic Set command after t seconds.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: PIR Sensor Alarm Elimination Time Configuration
parameter.description: PIR Sensor Alarm Elimination Time Configuration<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtMin time is 5s. Eg If the config is 1, this means it will eliminate alarm after 1 * 5s = 5 seconds</p&gt <p&gtThe selected value is multiplied with 5. After this time the sensor will report PIR OFF.</p&gt <p&gtE.g. If you select value --&gt; 3 * 5s = 15 seconds.</p&gt <p&gtThe Sensor will report PIR Off after 15 seconds.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Lifeline
parameter.description: Send "notification_Report" to the device in Life line group

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Basic Set Command
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtWhen sensor is triggered:</p&gt <p&gt[Command Class BAsic, Basic Set, Value = 0xFF(default 0xFF, configurable, see Config Parameters)</p&gt <p&gtWhen light up timeout:</p&gt <p&gt[Command Class BAsic, BAsic Set, Value =0x00]</p&gt
